item.description:
Every year Boston By Foot creates the Big Foot tour - a spectacular that is given on Labor Day and that lasts 5 hours.

Boston By Foot's 29th annual Big Foot trek is entitled Donâ€™t Tread on Me: Transformative
Movements in Boston, 1620 to the Present Day. This tour explores transformative social movements that had their roots in Boston. These movements altered the course of religious thought, public school education, as well as the rights of African Americans, women, and the working poor.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Boston By Foot badges, bags, hats, etc.
item.name: Don't Tread On Me: Transformative Movements In Boston
